question: An organization wants to use multiple marketing datasets to forecast user acquisition. How should they use cloud technology to gain new insights from the data?

A.answer: Import the datasets into a custom data warehouse, and then archive old data

B.answer: Import and selectively archive the datasets in a custom data lake

C.answer: Separate the datasets and make predictions using machine learning

D.answer: Combine the datasets and make predictins using machine learning

question: An organization wants to collect metrics and metadata from their cloud applications and put them into dashboards. Which Google Cloud tool should they use?
A manager wants to review Google Cloud data access among their employees. Who is responsible for defining data access policies?
An organization has decided to modernize their applications in the cloud to keep up with their customer's needs. What may have prompted this business decision?

A.answer: Their on-premises applications only autoscale to meet demand

B.answer: They want to change from a pay-as-you-go model to a capital expenditure model

C.answer: Their source code changes erroneously without developer interaction

D.answer: Their on-premises applications take months to update and deploy

question: An organization needs to categorize a large group of photographs using pre-trained machine learning. Which Google Cloud product or service should the organization use?

An organization provides a loyalty program for its customers. It recently partnered with other businesses so that customers can get loyalty points at a range of other stores. Why should the organization use application programming interfaces (APIs)?

A.answer: To migrate all partner data for disaster recovery

B.answer: To analyze and publish loyalty program statistics to a dashboard

C.answer: To personalize recommendations for loyalty card users

D.answer: To connect third-party systems to ensure up-to-date information

question: How do out-of-box APIs make artificial intelligence and machine learning more accessible for all Google Cloud customers?

B.answer: They don't require data input and validation

D.answer: They all require custom training models

question: An organization finds that the amount of cash in their vending machines doesn't match the value ot items sold. They have decided to upgrade their vending machines with cloud-based mobile payment systems. How Could the organization benefit from this upgrade?

A.answer: They could relax data access permissions

B.answer: They could reduce their error budget overspend

C.answer: They could improve their perimeter security

D.answer: They could view data history to see transactions

question: A food delivery service needs access to real-time menu information from all partner restaurants. They also need to share customer order information with the restaurants in real-time. What should the organization use?
An organization is planning to create may new applications and needs a system for managing and orchestrating their containers. Why should they use Google Kubernets Engine?

A.answer: It enables rapid application deployment and testing

C.answer: It connects legacy systems to an application

D.answer: It provides pre-written source code for application development
